sn35.59:4.3: “Cakkhuṃ kho, bhikkhu, anattato jānato passato anusayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti … pe …
sn35.59:4.12: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi anattato jānato passato anusayā samugghātaṃ gacchanti.
sn35.59:4.13: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṃ passato anusayā samugghātaṃ gacchantī”ti.
